channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Persian Fonts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Persian Fonts

item.title: CVE-2023-7167|2024-08-28T15:17:23.111Z -- unknown -- persian%20fonts
item.description: The Persian Fonts WordPress plugin through 1.6 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
